All Classes

Class Description
Ball
this is an abstract class which is used for the rubber ball implementation.
BallClone
this class is an addition which creates a clone ball to increase the game enjoyability.
Brick
This class is an abstract class which is going to be used for implementation.
BrickDestroyer
this class is used to start the game with the main menu.
BrickFactory
this class is used to return the brick object used on the wall levels.
CementBrick
this class is used for the cement brick used for the walls.
ChainWallLevel
this class is used to create one of the levels.
ClayBrick
this class is for the clay brick for the wall.
Crack
this class is used to make a crack path for the brick.
Crackable
this interface is used to allow the class to have crackable feature
CurlyLinesWallLevel
this class is used to create one of the levels.
DebugConsoleController
this controller is used to deal with the user input on the debug console.
Entities
this is an abstract class which is used to indicate that the classes that extends it is an entity object.
FullWallRowsLevels
this abstract class is used to call methods which are used in multiple classes.
Game
this class is used to generate the level and maintain some game condition.
GameController
this class is used as the controller for the game state controller where it is in control of the game play.
GameScore
this class is used to record the user game score for each level.
GameScoreDisplay
this class is used to display the score on a pop-up screen
InfoMenuController
this class is used to display the info to the player on how to play the game.
LevelFactory
this class is used to get the level template for wall level generation.
MainMenuController
this class is used to display and allow the user to select an option on the main menu.
Movable
this interface is used to allow a moving behavior for the entities.
Paddle
this class is used for the user to move the player.
PauseMenuController
this class is used to deal with the user input when it is in the pause menu.
Player
this class is used to store the information about the user current level, tries left and current mode.
RandomWallLevel
this class is used to create one of the wall level.
ReinforcedSteelBrick
this class is for the reinforced steel brick which is used for the level.
RubberBall
this class is for the rubber ball, an extension from ball abstract class.
SoundEffects
this class contains all the sound effects for the gameplay.
SteelBrick
this class is for the steel brick which is used for the level.
StraightLinesLevel
this class is used to create one of the levels.
WallLevelTemplates
this interface is used to create multiple wall levels.
